thag1.69:0.4_0: Standing on the bank of the river Channa,
thag1.69:1.1_0: Hearing the sweet Dhamma taught by the master
thag1.69:1.2_0: of universal understanding and superior knowledge,
thag1.69:1.3_0: I’ve entered the path to realize the deathless—
thag1.69:1.4_0: he is the expert on the road to sanctuary.
